PHRASE.LANG: With "Swift Deth" and "Vaporize" as default precepts, Dethcube acts exactly as advertised, as a powerful cube of "deth". Comes loaded with Deth Machine Rifle weapon. [#Legal]
Avec "Swift Deth" et "Vaporize" comme préceptes de défaut, DETHCUBE agit exactement comme annoncé, comme un cube puissante de "deth". Chargé avec le fusil automatique Deth arme. [#Legal]
With "Swift Deth" and "Vaporize" as default precepts, Dethcube acts exactly as advertised, as a powerful cube of "deth". Comes loaded with Deth Machine Rifle weapon. [#Legal]
